item.title: By: Arkadin
item.dc:creator: Arkadin
item.description:
Why is your blog like 4" wide? Almost the worst possible format to post code snippets in. Gone are the days of 12" computer screens. At least it's not bright white text on a pure black background, though.
Good content, though; thoroughly enjoy it. Keep it up!
item.content:encoded:
Why is your blog like 4″ wide? Almost the worst possible format to post code snippets in. Gone are the days of 12″ computer screens. At least it’s not bright white text on a pure black background, though.

Good content, though; thoroughly enjoy it. Keep it up!
